snippet: Multiple appliances had been connected to a power strip in an apartment on the 20th floor of the Strand luxury building, according to a Fire Department official.
abstract: New York Fire Dept reports that fire in Midtown Manhattan luxury high-rise tower that left Daniel McClung dead and his husband in serious condition has been traced to an overloaded electrical power strip.
lead_paragraph: Multiple appliances had been connected to a power strip in an apartment on the 20th floor of the Strand luxury building, according to a Fire Department official.

headline.main: Deadly Hell’s Kitchen Blaze Traced to Electrical Wire, Fire Dept. Says
headline.print_headline: Fatal Midtown Fire Traced to Wire
